fields.name: AccuracyandQualityTitle
fields.fieldText:
SCORECARD


ACCURACY / QUALITY

fields.name: UpdatesCRM
fields.fieldText: Did the agent update the CRM ticket?

fields.name: Reading
fields.fieldText: Did the agent correctly read the description?

fields.name: Listen
fields.fieldText: Did the agent listen to the chatter's needs?

fields.name: Comprehensiontext
fields.fieldText: Did the agent comprehend their question?

fields.name: SubjectofChat
fields.fieldText: Did the agent capture the correct subject reason for chat?

fields.name: CorrectInformation
fields.fieldText: Did the agent provide the customer with the correct information?

fields.name: VerifyIdentity
fields.fieldText: Did the agent capture/verify the caller's information?

fields.name: CleanNotation
fields.fieldText: Did the agent use helpful comments about the conversation or capture ambiguous notation about the chat in the ticket notes section?

fields.name: ScorecardTitleText
fields.fieldText: SCORECARD

fields.fieldText: Date/Time

fields.name: ProfessionalismandFinesseTitle
fields.fieldText:
SCORECARD


PROFESSIONALISM / FINESSE

fields.name: GrammarTextDisplay
fields.fieldText: Did the agent use appropriate grammar?

fields.name: SpellingTextBlock
fields.fieldText: Did the agent use appropriate spelling? Is the response clear?

fields.name: SpacingTextBlock
fields.fieldText: Did the agent use appropriate spacing? Words spaced adequately so to ensure customer can understand the agent. Use of appropriate sentence structure.

fields.name: CourteousPoliteText
fields.fieldText: Did the agent ask permission to place the customer on hold, while they research their account? Thank them for holding when they came back to the chat? Uses courtesy positive communication and words courtesy words throughout the chat (May I, please, thank you). Uses expressive and enthusiastic responses (Excellent, Incredible). Shows appropriate empathy - sounds like you care.

fields.name: NegativeTowardsInstitutionBlock
fields.fieldText: Did the agent agree with the student about their negative experience at CCC or did they attempt to repair the relationship and portray confidence in themselves and the institution?

fields.name: RESOURCEFULNESSBlock
fields.fieldText:
SCORECARD


RESOURCEFULNESS

fields.name: PastMemosFAQCCCWebsiteBlock
fields.fieldText: Did the agent use the correct resources/procedures? Did the agent leverage their CCC Website to locate the information?

fields.name: StandardTextBlock
fields.fieldText: Did the agent use the standard text created for the FAQ?

fields.name: ResearchAccount
fields.fieldText: Did the agent research the account?

fields.name: FollowChatFlowBlock
fields.fieldText: Did the agent cover all key points on the script or chat flow?
